prompt: How can I share sound from my computer in a Microsoft Teams meeting?
ideal_response:
To share sound from your computer in a Microsoft Teams meeting:
- Click on the "Share Content" icon found next to the "Leave Meeting" button.
- On the top left of your sharing options, enable the "Include computer sound" option.

prompt: How do I share the sound from my computer in a Teams meeting?
ideal_response:
To share sound from your computer in a Microsoft Teams meeting:
- Click on the "Share Content" icon found next to the "Leave Meeting" button.
- On the top left of your sharing options, enable the "Include computer sound" option.

prompt: How do I share the sound from my computer in a meeting?
ideal_response:
To share sound from your computer in a Microsoft Teams meeting:
- Click on the "Share Content" icon found next to the "Leave Meeting" button.
- On the top left of your sharing options, enable the "Include computer sound" option.

prompt: Can I connect my personal device to NVIDIA WiFi or network?
ideal_response: No, your personal devices must only be connected to the Guest or Visitor Wifi networks. To connect to the visitor Wi-Fi, search for NV_VISITOR in your available wireless network and connect to it.  Password is listed under "Visitor Wi-Fi" (NVINFO → Support & Tools → Visitor Wi-Fi )

prompt: Can I use my own laptop for work?
ideal_response: It is mentioned that you can use your own laptop for work. However, your personal machines are not supported by NVIDIA IT for hardware, software or configurations. It is also important that you follow certain minimum security practices in order to keep work data secure.

prompt: Can I use my own phone number and mobile phone for work?
ideal_response: Yes, at NVIDIA, employees are able to use their personal phones and phone numbers for work.

prompt: Does NVIDIA offer mobile phones to employees?
ideal_response: Yes, but mobile phones are only available to employees, with a business justification and approval from their manager.

prompt: how do I change a svc account password?
ideal_response:
You can do this from any NVIDIA device, regardless of OS (Windows, MacBook, or Linux), so long as you are connected to NVIDIA VPN or internal network.  

1. Open an incognito or inPrivate window from your browser. Go to the Microsoft password change portal: https://portal.microsoftonline.com/ChangePassword.aspx. 

Note: You must do this from incognito or inPrivate mode, otherwise the browser will automatically assume you are changing the password for your personal @nvidia.com account instead of the service account

2. You will be prompted to log in. Sign in with the service account name and old/current password. 

3. Enter the old password, new password, and repeat the new password. Hit Submit.

4. When the password change succeeds, you will be auto-logged out of the account and prompted to sign in again. please verify that you are able to sign in with the new password.

prompt: How do I change my NVIDIA password on Windows?
ideal_response: You can change your NVIDIA password on any internet connected device by visiting the [change password portal | https://account.activedirectory.windowsazure.com/ChangePassword.aspx]. On Windows, you can also use ctrl-alt-delete method.

prompt: How do I change my password?
ideal_response: You can change your NVIDIA password on any internet connected device by visiting the change password portal. On Windows, you can also use ctrl-alt-delete method and on Macs you can additionally use the NoMAD application to change your password as well.

prompt: How do I change the password for my service account?
ideal_response:
You can do this from any NVIDIA device, regardless of OS (Windows, MacBook, or Linux), so long as you are connected to NVIDIA VPN or internal network.  

1. Open an incognito or inPrivate window from your browser. Go to the Microsoft password change portal: https://portal.microsoftonline.com/ChangePassword.aspx. 

Note: You must do this from incognito or inPrivate mode, otherwise the browser will automatically assume you are changing the password for your personal @nvidia.com account instead of the service account

2. You will be prompted to log in. Sign in with the service account name and old/current password. 

3. Enter the old password, new password, and repeat the new password. Hit Submit.

4. When the password change succeeds, you will be auto-logged out of the account and prompted to sign in again. please verify that you are able to sign in with the new password.

prompt: How do I connect to I connect to VPN on a Mac?
ideal_response:
There are a couple of ways to connect to the VPN on a Mac. You can use either the Pulse Secure VPN client, or the OpenConnect VPN client software.

Using Pulse Secure:

Download the Pulse Secure software, install & run.
Add a new VPN URL connection by clicking on the "+" button.
For details, refer to this IT article KB0011793.

Using OpenConnect:

Download OpenConnect, install & run.
Configure the VPN connection settings.
For detailed instructions, refer to this page.

prompt: Does NVIDIA offer benefits for mental health?
ideal_response:
Yes, NVIDIA offers a variety of mental health benefits and resources to support employees. These resources are designed to help manage stress, anxiety, depression, loss, confusion, frustration, or any other challenge. If immediate help is needed, employees can schedule a virtual visit with a mental health care provider or contact the Employee Assistance Program (EAP), available 24/7, at 1-844-729-5172. 

NVIDIA also provides dedicated counselors, Clark Hsu and Chris Senter, whom employees can connect with online or via phone. Other resources include the Ginger app for 24/7 emotional support, LinkedIn Learning for mental health support, and Cigna Mental Health Resources for Cigna members. 

Additionally, NVIDIA has a team of individuals certified in mental health first aid who are trained to have confidential conversations about mental health and substance use problems, and can connect employees to the right resources quickly.

prompt: how can I log into VSP site?
ideal_response: To log in to VSP, you need to register once for an account. Use your registered username and password to log in. If you don't remember, you can use the forgot your password or username link to retrieve your credentials. For VSP, your Alternate ID is used in place of your SSN.

prompt: How do I apply for paternity leave?
ideal_response:
To begin the process for requesting a leave of absence, reach out to our leave administrator, the Larkin Company at 1.866.923.3336 or NVIDIA-LOA@thelarkincompany.com.

Larkin will provide a checklist of items to complete as well as the necessary paperwork required to request the leave. They will also be able to answer any questions you may have about how your pay will be coordinated while out on a leave absence.

If you have additional questions about the leave process, please reach out to Larkin directly.

For additional information visit the Leave of Absence Page and the NVIDIA Benefits website.

prompt: What is my benefits Alternate ID?
ideal_response:
NVIDIA created an alternate ID number to use in place of your SSN. This alternate ID number can be used to identify you in our Cigna plans for medical and mental health services, Delta Dental, VSP, Crossover, LegalEase, Identity Force, GuidanceResources EAP, Pet Insurance, Hospital Indemnity, and Accident Insurance. 

The formula for your alt ID is: 81 + your 2-digit year of birth + your NVIDIA badge number (up to 5 digits). If your NVIDIA badge number is less than 5 digits, simply precede it with enough zeroes to create a full 9-digit number.

For example, John’s birth year was 1978, and his employee badge number is 6852. His alt ID is: 81 + 78 + 06852 = 817806852.

prompt: What is a Health Savings Account (HSA)?
ideal_response:
A Health Savings Account (HSA) is a personal savings account that you use to save and pay for qualifying healthcare expenses. You can open an HSA if you are enrolled in an “HSA-qualified” health plan. NVIDIA will contribute up to $3,000 to your account, depending on the plan you choose and how many dependents you cover.

A few important HSA features:

You own the account. The money is yours to keep forever even if you leave the company or retire.
There is no “use it or lose it” rule. Unused money in your HSA is yours to keep.
Your HSA deposits and withdrawals (for eligible expenses) are tax-free.
You can invest your funds to make them grow.
If you contributed to an HSA with a prior employer in the same plan year, you’ll need to deduct that amount from your NVIDIA annual election contribution. Otherwise, you’ll exceed the IRS annual amount.
See the list of qualifying expenses on the IRS website.

For more information about HSAs visit the NVIDIA Benefits website.

prompt: How to request a leave of absence (LOA)?
ideal_response:
o begin the process for requesting a leave of absence, reach out to our leave administrator, the Larkin Company at 1.866.923.3336 or NVIDIA-LOA@thelarkincompany.com.

Larkin will provide a checklist of items to complete as well as the necessary paperwork required to request the leave. They will also be able to answer any questions you may have about how your pay will be coordinated while out on a leave absence.

Note: Larkin will work with us to coordinate your pay and time off. A notification email is sent by Larkin as well with dates of your leave to your manager, payroll and HR. Please do not submit any time off requests through the system.

If you have additional questions about the leave process, please reach out to Larkin directly.

For additional information visit the [Leave of Absence Page | https://nvidia.sharepoint.com/sites/nvinfo/hr/Pages/TimeAway/LOA-US.aspx] and the NVIDIA Benefits website.

For additional information visit the [Leave of Absence Page | https://nvidia.sharepoint.com/sites/nvinfo/hr/Pages/TimeAway/LOA-US.aspx] and the NVIDIA Benefits website.

prompt: How do I apply for maternity leave?
ideal_response:
o begin the process for requesting a leave of absence, reach out to our leave administrator, the Larkin Company at 1.866.923.3336 or NVIDIA-LOA@thelarkincompany.com.

Larkin will provide a checklist of items to complete as well as the necessary paperwork required to request the leave. They will also be able to answer any questions you may have about how your pay will be coordinated while out on a leave absence.

Note: Larkin will work with us to coordinate your pay and time off. A notification email is sent by Larkin as well with dates of your leave to your manager, payroll and HR. Please do not submit any time off requests through the system.

If you have additional questions about the leave process, please reach out to Larkin directly.

For additional information visit the [Leave of Absence Page | https://nvidia.sharepoint.com/sites/nvinfo/hr/Pages/TimeAway/LOA-US.aspx] and the NVIDIA Benefits website.

prompt: When can I enroll in the Employee Stock Purchase Plan (ESPP)?
ideal_response:
New Hires: ESPP Open Enrollment begins on your hire date and ends on the last day of the 1st month in which you were hired at 11:59pm (ET). During your first week, you will receive an email from dse_na2@docusign.net which contains a link to your personalized DocuSign enrollment form to complete and sign (keep your receipt). Stock Administration will automatically receive a copy of your completed DocuSign enrollment form. See New Hire Enrollment [FAQ|https://nvidia.sharepoint.com/sites/stock/Shared%20Documents/ESPP/FAQs%20-New%20Hire%20ESPP_Mar2018.pdf]. 

Existing Employees & New Hires who missed the 1st month enrollment deadline: Company-wide ESPP Open Enrollment occurs twice a year during the last two weeks in Feb and Aug. During Open Enrollment, enrollments/changes are made directly by employees through their Schwab EAC account. Stock Administration will send out email notifications for ESPP Open Enrollment.

For more information, visit the NVINFO [Stock Administration page|https://nvidia.sharepoint.com/sites/stock].

prompt: How do I change my BitLocker Pin?

prompt: Will waiving medical coverage receive me any credit?
ideal_response: Waiving enrollment in a medical plan on the Benefits Enrollment Site, will result in you receiving a $100 monthly credit on your paycheck. Restrictions may apply if you have a spouse, domestic partner, or other eligible family member who is also employed by NVIDIA.

prompt: How much credit do we get if we waive medical coverage?

prompt: How do would I know if I am subject to trading restriction periods?
ideal_response:
Within NVIDIA, during certain periods, specific individuals are blocked from trading. Employees are subject to the restriction periods if they work under the Designated Individuals List posted on the Stock Administration page.

If you want to check if you are affected, log on to Workday > Job & Pay, then view quick guide with instructions.

Visit the NVINFO Stock Administration page for more information.

prompt: Am I able to access my work computer and emails while on a Leave of Absence?
ideal_response: While on an approved Leave of Absence you are not authorized to work for the specified duration of your leave. All access to NVIDIA systems and networks, including building access using your name badge, will be disabled upon the start of your LOA. During this time, you are not expected to continue any kind of work, including accessing your e-mails.

prompt: If prompted to enter a Bitlocker Recovery Key, what should I do?
ideal_response:
From a separate device (computer or mobile phone) go to https://myaccount.microsoft.com and click Devices. Select your computer, then click View Bitlocker Keys. IT can also help look this up for you.

To avoid needing to enter a recovery key, avoid making changes to BIOS or boot settings without suspending Bitlocker protection first. You can suspend Bitlocker protection by following these instructions from Microsoft. When you resume protection, any new BIOS and boot settings will be saved and won’t cause you to need your recovery key.

prompt: How can I recover my BitLocker PIN if I have forgotten it?
ideal_response: Contact NVIDIA IT. NVIDIA IT is committed to employee privacy and only uses the recovery key when required. In case of a forgotten BitLocker PIN, a system failure, or an event such as employee termination or extended medical leave, there is a controlled list of technicians who have access to recover the encrypted data. NVIDIA IT does not directly store BitLocker PIN – they store a secure recovery key that can only be used on that specific machine.

prompt: How do I return my laptop to NVIDIA?
ideal_response:
For local users working in-office, NVIDIA-issued equipment can be dropped off at the closest IT Tech Lounge during regular working hours.

For remote users, NVIDIA-issued equipment that is no longer needed must be dropped off at your local FedEx store by using NVIDIA's FedEx Acct# 686-071-871 (US only). Please provide the account number, labelling and packaging will be covered at no cost to you.

Ship to:

NVIDIA
Attn: Anna Yin
2530 Zanker Road
San Jose, CA 95131

NOTE: The FedEx account cannot be used on the website.
